name: Temple of Elemental Evil, The
description: This Installer downloads and installs Circle of Eight total conversion Keep on the Borderlands 1.0.1
notes: A total conversion of Troika's 'The Temple of Elemental Evil' for the classic D&D module 'The Keep on the Borderlands.'
content:
files:
- patch: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/73408/121/9de2e1dd70cd8361a6cd2416b4f30bfa/?referer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.moddb.com%2Fmods%2Fthe-keep-on-the-borderlands
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    description: Moving the Mod
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Keep_on_the_Borderlands_1.0.1_Setup.exe
    src: patch
- task:
    description: Running the Mod
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Keep_on_the_Borderlands_1.0.1_Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: temple-of-elemental-evil-the
